name: colourfully
content:
colourfully adverb
(APPEARANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that has bright colours or a lot of different colours: The en suite bedrooms are colourfully decorated in elegant eighteenth-century style. The people are colourfully dressed and wave cheerfully.
More examplesFewer examplesThe book is richly and colourfully illustrated with drawings, photographs, and paintings.The stage was beautifully and colourfully lit.Sean picked up a few of the colourfully wrapped sweets.
